name: Into A Dream
description:
Into A Dream is a 2D story-driven adventure, focused on narrative, characters and exploration. You play as John Stevens, who wakes up inside the dreams of Luke Williams, a man who is suffering from a depression. John is told that he was sent there to find Luke, understand his story, his actions and help him to take the first step out of his darkness.

You will help John dig through Luke's dreams non-linearly, past and future, where memories are mixed with fantasy and symbolism, meet his close family and friends and unfold the heartbreaking, powerful and emotional journey of his life.

Key Features

  • An emotional, heartbreaking and humane narrative about love, hopelessness and depression
  • Beautiful original soundtrack and atmosphere
  • Puzzles that are directly related to the narrative
  • Full character voice over
  • Complex and real characters and relationships
